long_description: The Nau Down shirt marries the warmth of 800-fill down with the design of a snap-front shirt for great comfort and style when you're hiking through the hills or across town. Recycled polyester exterior has a Durable Water Repellent finish that causes water to bead up and roll off. Premium 800-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Quilted construction keeps loft equally distributed for maximum warmth. Shirt includes 6 snaps on the front placket. The Nau Down shirt has zippered hand pockets for securing essentials. Regular fit.
short_description: The Nau Down shirt marries the warmth of 800-fill down with the design of a snap-front shirt for great comfort and style when you're hiking through the hills or across town.
